snippet.title: Need for Speed: Carbon PS2 Gameplay HD (PCSX2)
snippet.description:
Need for Speed: Carbon PS2 Gameplay
Release Date: October 30, 2006
Platforms: Windows, Mac OS X,  PlayStation 2, PlayStation 3, Xbox, Xbox 360, Wii, GameCube, Game Boy Advance, Nintendo DS, PlayStation Portable

PCSX2 Settings:
Renderer: Direct3D11 (Hardware)

(Game hangs after opening cutscenes)
Go to Config - Emulation Settings - EE/IOP tab, and set Clamping Mode to "Full". 

Request by: Super Popgoes

Please leave a comment and rate it. :)
Enjoy !
